biography: Tomas is a golfer hailing from Espoo Ringside Golf, known for his calculated approach to the game and meticulous planning on the course. While some might find him reserved, those who know him well appreciate his dry wit and unwavering loyalty.

A former competitor in the Hector Trophée, Tomas has graced the fairways in three previous tournaments. Although he has not yet captured the coveted Hector Trophée nor secured an individual Victor trophy, his presence has always been felt, and he has contributed to the event through his fierce competitive spirit.

Currently considered retired from the Hector Trophée, Tomas will not be participating in the upcoming 2025 tournament. While his absence will be noted, the door remains open for a potential return in future years.
